name: BusinessBS
0:
”Alexa, open Business BS”
”Alexa, ask Business BS to baffle me with Business BS”
”Alexa, ask Business BS to give me some Business BS”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: business b. s.
des: Business BS recognizes that you use a lot of the same tired, old Business BS everyday.Well, it's time to "step out of your comfort zone. Level up your BS. Out-cliché your colleagues..' Alexa can now supply you with ALL-NEW, tired old Business BS!. You're going to love, laugh and enjoy your expanded BS vocabulary. Amaze the people you work with thanks to this extraordinary, ordinary, ability to BS with the worst of them.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
